# NSPickerTouchBarItem.ControlRepresentation.automatic

**Case**

The system dynamically changes the display mode based on the available space.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Display styles

- **NSPickerTouchBarItem.ControlRepresentation.expanded**: The system displays the control and all of its options directly.
- **NSPickerTouchBarItem.ControlRepresentation.collapsed**: The system displays the control’s options through a popover.
